title.value: Влияние осмотических ингибиторов на снижение скорости роста и сохранение жизнеспособности стерильных культур
Effect of osmotic inhibitors to reduce the rate of growth and the continued viability of sterile cultivars

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Goretskaya, A.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Central Botanical Garden

abstract.value: Collections of axenic cultures of different cultivars are usually sustained with their permanent growing in optimal conditions. But the most important hindrance of sustainable growing and preservation of Vaccinium species appear quick aging of the planting material and destruction of the plants. For the prevention of the plants' losses it is necessary to replant the stocking material on fresh nutritive mediums every 2-3 weeks. To solve this problem the authors of the article suggest utilization of special osmotic inhibitors for plant growth retardation.The results of the experimental studies of the effects of different concentrations of mannitol and sorbitol on the activation of meristems, growth rate and viability of regenerated axenic culture of 6 varieties of Vaccinium corymbosum L. and 3 varieties of Vaccinium vitis-ideas L are presented in the article. It is shown that the investigated parameters depend on osmotic inhibitors contained in the culture medium, their concentration and varietal identity of plants.
